title: Retaliation
description: With all of their recent media attention and happy news, Klive expects Nightshade leadership to back off. As Jase keeps personal watch over not only Kinsley, but Klive, it becomes clear that someone close to them has taken it upon themselves to expose the truth to Kinsley's parents, and while Jase intercepts one attempt, the next blows everything wide open.
author: Lynessa James
